channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Who is Laura Loomer, President Trump's self-described chief 'loyalty enforcer'?

item.title: Epstein Bantered Regularly With Larry Summers

item.title: New malaria drug could be a life-saver as the standard drug shows signs of weakness
item.description: The best drug to fight malaria is facing increased resistance from the parasites it fights. Now there's an alternative in the pipeline and it looks pr...

item.title: Greetings from the Arctic Circle, where an icebreaker ship drew polar bears' attention
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: The chess federation accuses a former champion of harassing a rival who died

item.title: City Council Approves Plan That Could Bring 14,700 Homes to Queens
item.description: The New York plan would open up 54 blocks of Long Island City, which are mostly warehouses and parking lots, to housing.

item.title: California Rain Forecast Suddenly Intensifies, Raising Flooding Risks

item.title: South Asia on Edge
item.description: There are no known links between two bomb attacks in India and Pakistan, but they come as tensions between the countries are already high.

item.title: How to Capture the Northern Lights With Just Your Smartphone
item.description: Modern cellphone cameras make it easy to capture the famously fickle Aurora Borealis.

item.title: Russia’s First A.I. Humanoid Robot Crashes Into the Tech Scene
item.description: AIDOL, Russia’s first AI humanoid robot, collapsed onstage moments after its unveiling at a technology event in Moscow on Tuesday.
